page.title: 02The Religion of Islam
page.content: EID is a religious festival. It is celebrated just like christmas. We have two festivals one is large and one small. The small is after the month of Romadon (Fasting). This is when we are not allowed to eat for a period of time example (2.am to 9.pm). The second one is the large one and it is celebrated because of a true story;Prophet Ibraham (who made the great home of Allah in Mecca)had a dream to cut his son to pieces and give them to friends poor and rich who believe in Allah. He was about to do this when Allah sent an angel who said to him "Don't, instead cut a lamb and give that away", so he did. To show his pleasure he set a feast for everyone and now everyone sets a feast and gives lambs away.
